committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to make election day a national holiday.

summary.text: Designates Election Day, the first Tuesday after the first Monday in November in every even-numbered year, a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to make election day a national holiday.
